attributes.action: MAKE REPORTING VACCINE DAMAGE 'LEGISLATIVE' FOR HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONALS
attributes.additional_details: I want the reporting of ANY suspected vaccine damage/adverse reaction seen by healthcare staff to be made legislative and the MHRA made to act upon such reports.
attributes.background: Re MHRA Yellow Card comment: "The scheme relies on voluntary reporting of suspected side effects or medical device incidents to be reported by health professionals and the public".
